public protected delegate Exception ^ NativeObjectSecurity::ExceptionFromErrorCode(int errorCode, System::String ^ name, SafeHandle ^ handle, System::Object ^ context);

param.name: name
param.span: 與 物件相關聯之安全物件的名稱。

span.span: The name of the securable object with which the object is associated.

param.name: handle

param.span: 包含有關例外狀況的來源或目的地之內容資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.

summary.span: 提供方法，便於整合子 (Integrator) 將數字錯誤碼對應至其建立的特定例外狀況。

span.span: Provides a way for integrators to map numeric error codes to specific exceptions that they create.
